entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wabush Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
